answers.answer: I'm 37 weeks today and my baby only weight 5 Lb

Ohh, they said that for me thats a good weight iv had extra scans and eveytime iv been they said shes fine, now its just her belly that is a little big :/ but what will happen at 36 weeks 5 days when i go back and her belly is bigger??.. I cant see the leaving me full term she is my first so im unsure as to what will happen? ?
I'm 32 weeks 5 days and at 30 weeks 6 days by baby was measuring 5 lbs 6 oz but doctor didn't seem concerned...he thinks the ultrasound could be wrong.
My doctor saw my baby at 8 week's 4 days was already an inch big said I could be eating to much high protein and calcium rich foods so it'll happen it's normal

This is the opposite of my current dilemma :-/My boys due 20/12 but he is measuring 3 1/2 weeks behind where he should be size wise, his development is great though. Have to have growth scan next week again. At 29w 5days he is measuring at barely 2lb.
Ohh I see well I hope everything goes well for ypu keep informed :) Xx

My sons abdominal circumference measured consistently big like 97th percentile, everything else average. Supposedly its an indicator for gedtational diabetes but all my tests with him came back fine, he was just a big baby. Anyway, the risk is a high chnace of getting stuck or shoulder dislocation but it completely depends on your pelvis and how your progressing. Your dr will be aware of all this and able to talk you through it. A scan closer to due date will give you a better idea. Wishing you lots of luck!

question: I went to have a scan yesterday and my baby weighs 6lb 3ozs and im 34 and 6 days, due 13th november, this was ment to be my last scan but Im having another on the 21st to check babys belly is too big they said the head size and every thing else was fine but bellys just measuring little bigger on the graphs... what I wont to know is when i go back and if her belly is bigger at 36 weeks 5days, what will happen will they induce me??  Book me in for c section....please comment if you can thanks :) Xx
title: Babys belly is big!?
